title: A New Beginning
body: The micronation of Medoles is opening its doors, inviting you to join its vibrant community.

title: Candidates for Presidential Elections are Set!
body: The nation has slowly been growing in the past weeks, and with that in mind, the elections have finally kicked off after a long wait.

title: Elections Take an Unexpected Turn
body: After Medoles had reached five citizens, the inaugural elections were on their way until they met an unexpected end.

title: Parliament Passes Its First Historic Bill
body: After a return to normalcy this holiday season and the re-election of X-Man, the parliament has finally opened its doors.

title: Two Bills Passed: Government's Agenda Gains Momentum
body: With the parliament opening its doors last week, it has made significant progress in advancing legislation, setting new precedents in Medoles.

title: Medoles Reveals Their New Coat of Arms
body: As matters begin to settle, Medoles still needs to define certain characteristics that determine the Medolite identity or even functional ones like the currency, capital or even an anthem.

title: The Race for Mayor: Meet the 5 Candidates for Medoles
body: The race for the position of Mayor of Medoles has officially begun.

title: A Fresh Start: A New Mayor for the New Year
body: As the sun sets on 2024, a new year begins with a new mayor. The mayoral election concluded last night, with the results announced earlier today, January 4th, 2025.

title: Medoles Chess: Clash of AI Chatbots
body: The Chess world is stepping foot into the wealthy lands of Medoles.

title: New Contenders Announced for Presidential Elections
body: With the new year comes a new Mayor, but also a new President of Medoles.

title: A Historic Moment: The First Senate Elections and Its Candidates
body: As one of the main changes under the newly established constitution, the first of many Senate elections is here.

title: Medoles Welcomes Its First Senators
body: With the new governmental positions in place and the inaugural Senate election coming to an end, our first two senators are revealed.

title: Senator Election Candidates and New President Revealed
body: This week has plenty to offer, with ongoing senatorial elections and appointments for the new positions in the Medolite government.

title: Medoles Chess Club on the Rise
body: The Medoles Chess Club (MCC), the main chess governing body in the micronation, recently joined a chess league.

title: New Candidates on the Horizon for Senator
body: The Senatorial Elections are back with a new round, with Helium and PinkMappre's at stake.

title: First Bill Ever Rejected, Nation Divided
body: The first legislation to be declined by the Parliament occurred earlier this week.

title: Presidential Elections: Three Candidates, One Winner
body: The presidential candidates are revealed, and the race is on.

title: The Senatorial Elections are Underway!
body: The race for the Senate is on!

title: New Faces in Senatorial Elections
body: As May is nearing, so is a new Senator election.

title: Senator Elections: Fresh Start
body: We are in May, and it's exam season. This means some tough times are ahead for some folks, but fear not! As Summer creeps in, so are new Senatorial elections!

title: Heated Senate Election Divides the Nation
body: June and the summer are dawning on us, so is a new election cycle with the Senatorial elections.

title: Presidential Candidates to Represent Medoles on the Micronational Stage
body: After a historical Senatorial election that will likely shape the very future of Medoles for the foreseeable future, we will now be able to tackle the Presidential election.

title: 10th Senatorial Election is Underway
body: As we are finally reaching Pride month, it is time for our first elections in June.

title: 6 Candidates, 2 Senate Seats
body: Amidst the hot summer of June, we are ready for a big shake-up in the Senate, as two seats will be in contention this week!

title: Senate Race Heats Up With 6 Candidates
body: As we hit July, we are also hitting our 12th Senatorial election.

title: 5 Candidates Battling for Key Senate Seats
body: With the recent heatwaves of July, the political scene is about to heat up with the beginning of a new election cycle and a new Senatorial election.

title: Presidential Election Heats up: New President on the Horizon
body: The Presidential term of Unicorn is coming to an end, and with that, a new President shall take their place.

title: Expanded Senate Sets the Stage for a Historic Election
body: August is rolling around as Summer is dawning on us.

title: Senate Election: Full 5-Seat Senate on the Horizon
body: We're nearing the middle of August, and the 15th Senatorial Election for Medoles is approaching.
